The green box appear angled out from the yellow box and embedded in it.

transform: translateZ(-100px) rotateY(45deg);
{
  "bounds": [800, 600],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "position": [108, 73],
          "bounds": [304, 304],

                      "position": [40, 40],
